field.name: Standard level
field.comments: 'Field value must be 03 - Meaning use of the standard DSTU X9.37 – 2003

field.name: Test File Indicator
field.comments: T for Test File, P for Production File

field.name: Immediate Destination Routing Number
field.comments: Must be a valid routing and transit number issued by the ABA’s Routing Number Registrar. The routing number shall be mod-checked with a valid check digit

field.name: Immediate Origin Routing Number
field.comments: Must be a valid routing and transit number issued by the ABA’s Routing Number Registrar. The routing number shall be mod-checked with a valid check digit

field.name: File Creation Date
field.comments: Must be a valid date in YYYYMMDD format. Eastern time zone shall be used.

field.name: File Creation Time
field.comments: Must be military time in HHMM format. Eastern time zone shall be used.

field.name: Resend Indicator
field.comments: 'N' - Original File or 'Y' - Resend File (Meaning a file that contains the same data as a previously send file.)

field.name: Immediate Destination Name
field.comments: Expanded Field type to support greater variety of abbreviations

field.name: Immediate Origin Name
field.comments: Expanded Field type to support greater variety of abbreviations

field.name: File ID Modifier
field.comments: This field is used to uniquely identify files. Lower case letters are NOT valid. ID is required if fields 4, 5, 6 and 7 are equal on other files within a file creation date.

field.name: Collection Type Indicator
field.comments: Field value must be '12' or '90' - Meaning a deposit; the transaction carries value; data are treated as final. Note - Field 2 in Record 10 and 20 must be identical.

field.name: Destination Routing Number
field.comments: Must be a valid routing and transit number issued by the ABA’s Routing Number Registrar. The routing number shall be mod-checked with a valid check digit

field.name: ECE Institution Routing Number
field.comments: Must be a valid routing and transit number issued by the ABA’s Routing Number Registrar. The routing number shall be mod-checked with a valid check digit.

field.name: Cash Letter Business Date
field.comments: Must be a valid date in YYYYMMDD format

field.name: Cash Letter Creation Date
field.comments: Must be a valid date in YYYYMMDD format. Eastern time zone shall be used.

field.name: Cash Letter Creation Time
field.comments: The time the cash letter is created: (UTC) HHMM HH: '00' thru '23' MM: '00' thru '59'

field.name: Cash Letter Record Type Indicator
field.comments: The only valid values are: 'I' Forward or Return Image Cash Letter file - Cash letter contains electronic check records (Type 2x’s, 3x’s) and image records (Type 5x’s) ‘N’ No MICR data check records or image records (Type 2x’s, 3x’s, 5x’s) e.g., Account Totals only or an empty cash letter. 'E' ECP - indicates Electronic Check Records with no image records. 'F' Image to follow - indicates Electronic Check Records and image records for information that correspond to a previously sent Cash Letter (i.e., 'E' file)

field.name: Cash Letter Documentation Type Indicator
field.comments: The only valid values are: ‘C’ Image provided separately, no paper provided ‘G’ Image included, no paper provided ‘K’ No image provided, no paper provided ‘L’ No image provided, no paper provided, image upon request ‘Z’ Not Same Type – Documentation associated with each item in Cash Letter will be different. The Check Detail Record (Type 25) has to be interrogated for further information.

field.name: Cash Letter ID
field.comments: Must be unique within a Cash Letter Business Date

field.name: Originator Contact Name
field.comments: Company name assigned to the depository account

field.name: Originator Contact Phone Number
field.comments: Phone number of the contact at the company that creates the cash letter

field.name: Collection Type Indicator
field.comments: Field value must be '12' or '90' - Meaning a deposit; the transaction carries value; data are treated as final. Note - Field 2 in Record 10 and 20 must be identical.

field.name: Destination Routing Number
field.comments: Must be a valid routing and transit number issued by the ABA’s Routing Number Registrar. The routing number shall be mod-checked with a valid check digit . Must be the same as the Destination Routing Number (Field 3) in the Cash Letter Header Record (Type 10)

field.name: ECE Institution Routing Number
field.comments: Must be a valid routing and transit number issued by the ABA’s Routing Number Registrar. The routing number shall be mod-checked with a valid check digit Must be the same as the values in the ECE Institution Routing Number (Field 4) in the Cash Letter Header Record (Type 10).

field.name: Bundle Business Date
field.comments: Must be a valid date in YYYYMMDD format

field.name: Bundle Creation Date
field.comments: Must be a valid date in YYYYMMDD format . Eastern time zone shall be used.

field.name: Bundle ID
field.comments: Must be unique within a Cash Letter business date

field.name: Bundle Sequence Number
field.comments: Combination of Bundle ID (field 7) and Bundle Sequence Number (field 8) must be unique within the cash letter.

field.name: Cycle Number
field.comments: A number assigned by the creator. May denoted the day of the week or other internal reference.

field.name: Return Location Routing Number
field.comments: This field shall not be used. Returns location is identified in Addenda record ‘26’

field.name: Auxiliary On-Us
field.comments: Mandatory if present • On-Us symbols on the MICR line, shall not be included • Dashes must be retained

field.name: External Processing Code
field.comments: Mandatory if present on the MICR Line • The External Processing Code is position 44 of the MICR line. This field is located immediately to the left of the Routing Transit field. • The ONLY valid values are ‘0 – 9’ and ‘*’ (The field type of ‘NS’ is a deviation from the DSTU X9.37- 2003 Standard and clarifies which character types can be used in interoperable image exchange)

field.name: Payor Bank Routing Number
field.comments: Must be a valid routing and transit number issued by the ABA’s Routing Number Registrar. Shall represent the first 8 digits of the routing number.

field.name: Payor Bank Routing Number Check Digit
field.comments: Mandatory – shall be the routing number check digit. The combination of fields 4 and 5 must be a mod-checked routing number with a valid check digit. (The field type of ‘N’ is a deviation from the DSTU X9.37- 2003 Standard and clarifies which character types can be used in interoperable image exchange)

field.name: On-Us
field.comments: Mandatory if present on the MICR Line • The On-Us Field of the MICR document is located between positions 14 and 32 of the MICR Line of the item. • On-Us symbols, as they appear within this field on the MICR line, must be represented with a forward slash(/). • Dashes must be retained

field.name: Item Amount
field.comments: Dollar value of the Deposit - Must report the total value of all 25 Records in the cash letter.

field.name: ECE Institution Item Sequence Number
field.comments: A number assinged by creator that uniquely identifies the item in the cash letter.

field.name: Documentation Type Indicator
field.comments: The value will always be the same as the value in the Cash Letter Header Record(Type 10) Cash Letter Documentation Type Indicator(Field 8) unless that value is 'Z'. The only valid values are: 'C' Image provided separately, no paper provided 'G' Image included, no paper provided 'K' No image provided, no paper provided 'L' No image provided, no image provided, image upon request

field.name: Return Acceptance Indicator
field.comments: Shall be present only under clearing arrangements

field.name: BOFD Indicator
field.comments: Field value preferred to be 'U'. if a value of 'N' or 'Y' is sent, the indicator will be ignored and passed as received.

field.name: Check Detail Record Addendum Count
field.comments: The number of Check Detail Addenda. Value must represent sum of the number of Type 26, Type 27 and Type 28 records and must be > ‘0’ and match the number of addendum records included

field.name: Record Number
field.comments: The Type ‘26’record with the highest number in this field shall indicate the current return location for this item

field.name: BOFD Routing Number
field.comments: Must be a valid routing and transit number issued by the ABA’s Routing Number Registrar. The routing number shall be mod-checked with a valid check digit. This Routing Number is specified by the ECE institution, indicating the location to which returns shall be sent. This is usually the Bank of First Deposit however it may be an institution other than the BOFD. This field shall be applied to this item and takes precedent over any value present in the Return Location Routing number (Field 10) in the Bundle Header Record (Type 20).

field.name: BOFD Business (Endorsement) Date
field.comments: In the case of the original creation of a Forward Presentment Check Detail Addendum A Record (Type 26), the year, month and day of the depository institution endorsement shall be included. Must be a valid date in YYYYMMDD format - the endorsement that designates the business date of the BOFD. If this record is created as a result of receiving a Return Addendum A Record (Type 32) record, it shall include the date received in that record clause 15.4

field.name: BOFD Item Sequence Number
field.comments: If there is no Check Detail Addendum C Record (Type 28) the sequence number is Mandatory. In the case of no Record Type 28, the sequence number field type must be numeric. If you are creating an original 26 Record, field shall contain numeric data and shall not contain all blanks. If BOFD Item Sequence Number (Field 4) in the Return Addendum A Record (Type 32) was received electronically, that data shall be transferred to this field which may be all blanks.

field.name: Truncation Indicator
field.comments: 'Y' indicates the BOFD Routing number (Field 3) is the truncator of the original check. (Institutions truncating a substitute check should not use a ‘Y”). N' indicates BOFD is not truncator of original check

field.name: User Field
field.comments: Defined as the second byte of the user field in DSTU X9.37 - 2003

field.name: Endorsing Bank Routing Number
field.comments: Must be a valid routing and transit number issued by the ABA’s Routing Number Registrar. The routing number shall be mod-checked with a valid check digit

field.name: Endorsing Bank Endorsement Date
field.comments: Must be a valid date in YYYYMMDD format – designates the business date of the Endorsing Bank

field.name: Endorsing Bank Item Sequence Number
field.comments: Field must contain a numeric value. It can not be all blanks.

field.name: Truncation Indicator
field.comments: 'Y' indicates this endorsing bank is the truncator of original check. (Institutions truncating a substitute check should not use a ‘Y”). 'N' indicates this endorsing bank is not the truncator of original check

field.name: Return Reason
field.comments: Spaces unless the item was returned and is being represented. If represented, the valid value will be the same as listed in the Return Record (Type 31) Return Reason (Field 6). Not all Check Detail Addendum C Records (Type 28) will have a return reason in this field. Refer to Section 2 – Table of Valid Return Reason Codes for Return Reason

field.name: User Field
field.comments: Field Position has been redefined (expanded) to align with Return Addendum D (Type 35)

field.name: Endorsing Bank Identifier
field.comments: Defined as a Reserved Field in DSTU X9.37 – 2003 A code used to identify the bank’s role in the collection process. The only valid values are: ‘0’ Depository Bank (BOFD) this value shall only be used when the Check Detail Addendum A Record (Type 26) reflects the Return Processing Bank in lieu of BOFD ‘1’ Other Collecting Bank ‘2’ Other Returning Bank ‘3’ Payor Bank

field.name: Image Indicator
field.comments: The only valid values are: '0 indicates image view not present. Must adhere to Annex E '1' indicates Image view is check or substitute check

field.name: Image Creator Routing Number
field.comments: Must be a valid routing and transit number issued by the ABA’s Routing Number Registrar. The routing number shall be mod-checked with a valid check digit

field.name: Image Creator Date
field.comments: YYYYMMDD indicates date the image was created

field.name: Image View Format Indicator
field.comments: Primary views shall only have a value of ‘00’ Shall only be present when the Image Indicator (Field 2) is not equal to ‘0’. This is a deviation from the DSTU X9.37 Standard. • (This clarifies an error in the DSTU X9.37-2003 Standard)

field.name: Image View Compression Algorithm Identifier
field.comments: Primary views shall only have a value of ‘00’ Shall only be present when the Image Indicator (Field 2) is not equal to ‘0’. This is a deviation from the DSTU X9.37 Standard. • (This clarifies an error in the DSTU X9.37-2003 Standard).

field.name: Image View Data Size
field.comments: Field is ignored. Image View Data size shall be obtained from Image View Data Record (Type 52) Length of Image Data (Field 18).

field.name: View Side Indicator
field.comments: The only valid values are: '0' Front Image View '1' Rear Image View

field.name: View Descriptor
field.comments: The only valid value for primary views is: '00' Full View

field.name: Digital Signature Indicator
field.comments: Field value must be 0 - Meaning digital signature is not present.

field.name: ECE Institution Routing Number
field.comments: Must be a valid routing and transit number issued by the ABA’s Routing Number Registrar. The routing number shall be mod-checked with a valid check digit. Must be the same as ECE Institution Routing number in the Bundle Header Record (Type 20).

field.name: Bundle Business Date
field.comments: Must be a valid date in YYYYMMDD format

field.name: Cycle Number
field.comments: A code assigned by creator. May denote the day of the week or other internal reference number.

field.name: ECE Institution Item Sequence Number
field.comments: A number assigned by creator that uniquely identifies each Check Detail Record (Type 25) in the cash letter.

field.name: Clipping Origin
field.comments: ’0’ indicates Full View. Primary front and rear views shall only have a value of ‘0’. '0'- Meaning clipping information is not present.

field.name: Length of Image Reference Key
field.comments: '0' indicates Image Reference Key (Field 15) is not present

field.name: Length of Digital Signature
field.comments: Field must be 0 - Meaning digital signature is not present

field.name: Length of Image Data
field.comments: Total number of bytes in the Image data in this Image view data record

field.name: Record Usage Indicator
field.comments: Field value must be '2' - Meaning it represents the deposit slip.

field.name: Auxiliary On-Us
field.comments: Value from the Aux OnUs field of the Deposity slip, if present

field.name: Posting Account Routing Number
field.comments: Value in the Transit Routing Number of the Deposit Account

field.name: Posting Account Bank On-Us
field.comments: Value in the Bank On-Us field of the Deposit Account

field.name: Item Amount
field.comments: Dollar value of the Deposit - Must report the total value of all 25 Records in the cash letter/Bundel.

field.name: ECE Institution Item Sequence Number
field.comments: A number assigned by you that uniquely identifies the item in the Cash Letter

field.name: Documentation Type Indicator
field.comments: Field value must be 'G' - Meaning there are 2 images present. These images may be computer generated if it meets all BAC image format specifications.

field.name: Type of Account Code
field.comments: Field value must be '0'

field.name: Source of Work
field.comments: Field must be '2' space or '02' - Meaning internal branch

field.name: Items Within Bundle Count
field.comments: Total number of items sent within the bundle (all Check Detail Records - Type 25)

field.name: Bundle Total Amount
field.comments: Total US dollar value of the items within the bundle NOTE: Maximum cash letter amount is $99,999,999.99

field.name: MICR Valid Total Amount
field.comments: Total US dollar value of the items within the bundle NOTE: Maximum cash letter amount is $99,999,999.99

field.name: Images within Bundle Count
field.comments: Total number of image views within a bundle. It is expected that there is a front and back image for each item(therefore, should be 2X the number of items in the bundle)

field.name: Bundle Count
field.comments: Total number of bundles within the Cash letter

field.name: Items Within Cash letter Count
field.comments: Total number of items sent within the cash letter (all check Detail Records - Type 25)

field.name: Cash Letter Total Amount
field.comments: Total US dollar value of the cash letter. NOTE: Maximum cash letter amount is $99,999,999.99

field.name: Images Within Cash Letter Count
field.comments: Total number of image views within a cash letter.It is expected that there is a front and back image for each item (therefore,2X the number of items in the bundle)

field.name: Originator Contact Name
field.comments: Must match the field 11 of the Cash Letter Header Record (Type 10)

field.name: Cash Letter Count
field.comments: Total number of cash letters within the file

field.name: Total Record Count
field.comments: Total number of records of all types sent in the file, including the File Control Record

field.name: Total Item Count
field.comments: Total number of items sent within the file(all Check Detail Records - Type 25)

field.name: File Total Amount
field.comments: Total US dollar value of the complete file(all Check Detail Records - Type 25)
